title: One man's multinational
creator_credit: Ben Loeterman, Thomas Friedman and WGBH (Boston)
brief_description: Provides a history of the Bata shoe industry and then focuses on its operation as a multinational corporation. Raises issues surrounding the motivation behind the company’s installation of factories in Third World countries such as Kenya, highlighting the controversial nature of multinational corporations as such. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
